languages.text: "Я скажу, скажу! За решеткой вентиляционной — три пайка, горсть винтов и половинка лхо. Берите все, только пощадите!"
"I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"
languages.original_text: "Я скажу, скажу! За решеткой вентиляционной — три пайка, горсть винтов и половинка лхо. Берите все, только пощадите!"

traits.locale_text: "Listen, listen! Hear me out! There are three rations, a handful of bolts and half a lho stick behind the ventilation grid. Take everything, just don't kill me!"
"Listen, listen! Hear me out! There are three rations, a handful of bolts and half a lho stick behind the ventilation grid. Take everything, just don't kill me!"
"Listen, listen! Hear me out! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"
"Listen, listen! Hear me out! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"
"Listen, listen! Hear me out! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"
"Listen, listen! Hear me out! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"
"I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"
"I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"

languages.text: « Je vais tout vous dire ! Derrière la grille de ventilation, vous trouverez trois rations, une poignée de boulons et un reste de cigalho. Prenez le tout. Mais me tuez pas ! »
languages.original_text: "I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vais tout vous dire ! Derrière la grille de ventilation, vous trouverez trois rations, une poignée de boulons et un reste de cigalho. Prenez le tout. Mais me tuez pas ! »

languages.text: «¡Hablaré, hablaré! Hay tres raciones, un puñado de tornillos y medio cigarrillo de lho detrás de la rejilla de ventilación. Quedáoslo todo, ¡pero no me matéis!».
languages.original_text: "I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Hablaré, hablaré! Hay tres raciones, un puñado de tornillos y medio cigarrillo de lho detrás de la rejilla de ventilación. Quedáoslo todo, ¡pero no me matéis!».

languages.text: 「話すよ…！話すよ！換気口の奥に、食料が3つ、ボルトが一握り、アイホスティックが半分ある。全部持って行っていい。殺さないでくれ！」
languages.original_text: "I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"

traits.locale_text: 「話すよ…！話すよ！換気口の奥に、食料が3つ、ボルトが一握り、アイホスティックが半分ある。全部持って行っていい。殺さないでくれ！」

languages.text: “我说！我全说！我这边有三份口粮、一小把螺栓，通风网后面还有半根麻烟。你们全拿走，只要别杀我就好！”
languages.original_text: "I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"

traits.locale_text: “我说！我全说！我这边有三份口粮、一小把螺栓，通风网后面还有半根麻烟。你们全拿走，只要别杀我就好！”

languages.text: "Ich rede. Ich rede! Hinter dem Lüftungsgitter sind drei Rationen, eine Handvoll Bolzen und ein halber Lho-Stab. Nehmt Euch alles. Aber tötet mich nicht!"
languages.original_text: "I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich rede. Ich rede! Hinter dem Lüftungsgitter sind drei Rationen, eine Handvoll Bolzen und ein halber Lho-Stab. Nehmt Euch alles. Aber tötet mich nicht!"

languages.text: "Tamam, konuşacağım! Havalandırma ızgarasının arkasında üç kumanya, biraz bulon ve yarım bir liho dalı var. Hepsini alın. Yeter ki beni öldürmeyin!"
languages.original_text: "I'll talk, I'll talk! There are three rations, a handful of bolts, and half a lho-stick behind the ventilation grid. Take it all. Just don't kill me!"
